Uses of Class
tripleplay.entity.Entity

  • Packages that use Entity 
    Package Description
    tripleplay.entity  

    • Uses of Entity in tripleplay.entity

      Fields in tripleplay.entity with type parameters of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      react.Signal<Entity> World.entityAdded
      A signal emitted when an entity is added to this world.
      react.Signal<Entity> World.entityChanged
      A signal emitted when an entity in this world has changed (usually this means components have been added to or removed from the entity).
      react.Signal<Entity> World.entityDisabled
      A signal emitted when an entity in this world which was enabled becomes disabled.
      react.Signal<Entity> World.entityEnabled
      A signal emitted when an entity in this world which was disabled becomes enabled.
      react.Signal<Entity> World.entityRemoved
      A signal emitted when an entity is removed from the world.
      Methods in tripleplay.entity that return Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Entity Entity.add(Component comp)
      Adds the specified component to this entity.
      Entity Entity.add(Component[] comps)
      Adds the supplied components to this entity.
      Entity Entity.add(Component c1, Component c2, Component... rest)
      Adds the specified components to this entity.
      Entity World.create(boolean enabled)
      Creates and returns an entity.
      Entity World.entity(int id)
      Returns the entity with the specified id.
      Entity Entity.remove(Component comp)
      Removes the specified component from this entity.
      Entity World.restore(int id, BitVec components)
      Creates an entity with the specified id and component bitvec.
      Methods in tripleplay.entity that return types with arguments of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterator<Entity> World.entities()
      Returns an iterator over all entities in the world.
      Iterator<Entity> World.iterator()
